isValid

public boolean isValid(Date dateChecked)
determines if a passport is valid or not. if the date specified by the parameter dateChecked is on or before the expiration date on the passport then the passport is valid, otherwise it is not

Parameters:
dateChecked - the date that the passport date is to be compared to
Returns:
- true iff the dateChecked is on or before the passport date
